resources.string: Update Information
Please note, that your currently installed version of the %s is outdated and needs to be renewed.
Please note, that there is an update of the %s available. It is recommended that you install the new version at your earliest convenience.
For this purpose, you should visit the link below, download the new software package suitable for your platform and perform the update by launching the installation software.
ChipGateway Error
Please try again later. If the problem\npersists please contact the Helpdesk.
Activate called with an invalid refresh URL.
The URL in '%s' is not a valid URL.
The URL in '%s' is not a https URL.
The element '%s' is empty or missing in the activation parameters.
The element '%s' contains none of the admissible values.
Failed to open connection to ChipGateway server.
Invalid HTTP status code (%d) received from ChipGateway server.
Error processing ChipGateway message.
Error in HTTP protocol.
Failed to validate ChipGateway signature.
The version of the installed client is too old.
Unkown error occured during ChipGateway execution.
Error received from ChipGateway server (%s).
An internal ChipGateway server error has occurred.
